snippet: Both the great political parties are in the field for the November Contest. The two Conventions assembled at Syracuse last week, and their proceedings in detail have already been spread before the public. The Democratic Convention assembled first ...
lead_paragraph: Both the great political parties are in the field for the November Contest. The two Conventions assembled at Syracuse last week, and their proceedings in detail have already been spread before the public. The Democratic Convention assembled first and adjourned last.
